name: Guggenheim S&P SmallCap 600 Pure Value ETF
description: The Guggenheim S&P SmallCap 600 Pure Value ETF (GWX) is an exchange-traded fund that seeks to track the performance of the S&P SmallCap 600 Pure Value Index. This index is composed of small-cap stocks in the United States that exhibit strong value characteristics, determined by their price-to-earnings ratios, price-to-book ratios, and other fundamental measures. GWX aims to provide investors with exposure to the value segment of the small-cap equity market, allowing them to benefit from potential long-term capital appreciation. By focusing on pure value stocks, which are often undervalued compared to their peers, GWX offers an investment strategy that seeks to capitalize on the market's tendency to revert to the mean over time. The ETF is managed by Guggenheim Investments, a leading investment management firm known for its innovative investment solutions and research-driven approach. With a diversified portfolio, GWX can help investors reduce risk while maximizing potential returns in the small-cap segment of the market.
ceo: Mark A. W. M. W. McEwen

key_executives.name: Mark A. W. M. W. McEwen
